title: My download is stuck on "Calculating Differences | 2 Files scanned"
body: My league client is stuck on **_"Calculating Differences | 2 Files scanned"_**, I've tried deleting and reinstalling and it still says the same thing, can anyone help me please?

replies.body: It sounds like your patcher is trying to scan files, but is being blocked.  A settings with your OS or something else may need to get reconfigured to allow the patcher to proceed.  Our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide will do the trick to get you all fixed up!  let me know if you have any questions!
